entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 18.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 18.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 16.9°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 31. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
